data.title: Amazon Polly adds Arabic language support
data.description: On April 17th, 2019 Amazon Polly launched an Arabic female text-to-speech (TTS) voice called Zeina. This voice is clear and natural-sounding. The voice masters tongue twisters, and it can whisper, just like all other Amazon Polly products. Let’s hear Zeina introduce herself: Listen now Voiced by Amazon Polly Hello, my name is Zeina, I am the […]

data.title: 8 Useful R Packages for Data Science You Aren’t Using (But Should!)
data.tags: Data Science, Data Visualization, Intermediate, Libraries, Listicle, Machine Learning, Programming, R
data.description: Check out these 8 amazing R packages you should be using in your machine learning project but haven't heard of yet! Code plus examples included.

data.title: How Do Convolutional Layers Work in Deep Learning Neural Networks?
data.description: Convolutional layers are the major building blocks used in convolutional neural networks. A convolution is the simple application of a filter to an input that results in an activation. Repeated application of the same filter to an input results in a map of activations called a feature map, indicating the locations and strength of a […]

data.title: Highlights from the O’Reilly Artificial Intelligence Conference in New York 2019
data.description: Watch highlights from expert talks covering AI, machine learning, deep learning, ethics, and more.

data.title: Data fueling AI of the future
data.description: Thomas Henson considers how AI will shape the experiences of future generations.

data.title: Toward ethical AI: Inclusivity as a messy, difficult, but promising answer
data.description: Kurt Muehmel explores AI within a broader discussion of the ethics of technology, arguing that inclusivity and collaboration are necessary.

data.title: Automated ML: A journey from CRISPR.ML to Azure ML
data.description: Danielle Dean explains how cloud, data, and AI came together to help build Automated ML.

data.title: Fast, flexible, and functional: 4 real-world AI deployments at enterprise scale
data.description: Gadi Singer discusses the major questions organizations confront as they integrate deep learning.

data.title: Machine learning for personalization
data.description: Tony Jebara explains how Netflix is personalizing and optimizing the images shown to subscribers.

data.title: Checking in on AI tools
data.description: Ben Lorica and Roger Chen assess the state of AI technologies and adoption in 2019.

data.title: Is AI human-ready?
data.description: Aleksander Madry discusses roadblocks preventing AI from having a broad impact and approaches for addressing these issues.

data.title: AI and the robotics revolution
data.description: Martial Hebert offers an overview of challenges in AI for robotics and a glimpse at the exciting developments emerging from current research.

data.title: How AI adaptive technology can upgrade education
data.description: Joleen Liang explains how AI and precise knowledge points can help students learn.

data.title: How to Use Test-Time Augmentation to Make Better Predictions
data.description: Data augmentation is a technique often used to improve performance and reduce generalization error when training neural network models for computer vision problems. The image data augmentation technique can also be applied when making predictions with a fit model in order to allow the model to make predictions for multiple different versions of each image […]

data.title: OpenAI Five Defeats Dota 2 World Champions
data.description: OpenAI Five is the first AI to beat the world champions in an esports game, having won two back-to-back games versus the world champion Dota 2 team, OG, at Finals this weekend.

data.title: Introduction to entity embeddings with neural networks
data.description: Since a lot of people recently asked me how neural networks learn the embeddings for categorical variables, for example words, I’m going to write about it today. You all might have heard about methods like word2vec for creating dense vector representation of words in an unsupervised way.

data.title: How to Configure Image Data Augmentation in Keras
data.description: Image data augmentation is a technique that can be used to artificially expand the size of a training dataset by creating modified versions of images in the dataset. Training deep learning neural network models on more data can result in more skillful models, and the augmentation techniques can create variations of the images that can […]

data.title: Signal processor improves Echo’s bass response, loudness, and speech recognition accuracy
data.description: Multiband dynamics processing, which separately modifies volume in different frequency bands of an audio signal, is known to improve listeners’ audio experiences. But in the context of voice-controlled systems like the Amazon Echo family of products, it can also improve automatic speech recognition…
